translations: n.选修课，选修课程（elective 复数形式）

phrs.translation: 选择性外科手术；非急需施行的手术

sentences.sentence: My issue is, I have got two required courses and two electives.
sentences.translation: 我的问题是，我已经有两门必修课和两门选修课了。

sentences.sentence: Make sure you include all the classes you will have taken for your degree in finance and the electives too.
sentences.translation: 你要确保把获得金融学位所需的所有课程和选修课都包括在内。

sentences.sentence: Art and the computer class are both on the electives list.
sentences.translation: 美术课和电脑课都是在选修之列。
